title: Watch: BBC in Tehran for first time since protest crackdown
summary_full: Lyse Doucet reports from Iran, where she says the pain is still raw after unprecedented force was used to put down the protests there.
summary_public: Lyse Doucet reports from Iran, where she says the pain is still raw after unprecedented force was used to put down the protests there.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: unprecedented force was used to put down the protests
